hooks.prompt: A file was just modified. Check if the file is named 'content.md' in a presentation directory (has images/, data/, scripts/ folders). If it is a presentation's content.md file and the user has autoBuild enabled in their settings (.claude/presentation-creator.local.md), automatically rebuild the presentation by running the equivalent of /build-presentation. If autoBuild is not enabled or this is not a presentation directory, do nothing. Be silent about this check - only speak if you're rebuilding the presentation.

Check if the current directory contains a presentation (has content.md, images/, data/ folders). If it does, briefly mention that presentation-creator plugin is available and list the available commands: /create-presentation, /build-presentation, /validate-presentation, /preview-presentation. Keep this message very brief (1-2 lines). If not a presentation directory, say nothing about this plugin.
